io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration

Class ItemBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.item.Item>
      • net.minecraft.item.Item
        • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration.ItemBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.item.Item>

    public class ItemBase
extends net.minecraft.item.Item
    Base class for items for mods using ModXRegistration. This will automatically set the creative tab if it's defined in the mod.
